mortar.dagger1support

Class ObjectGraphService

  • java.lang.Object
    • mortar.dagger1support.ObjectGraphService

  • public class ObjectGraphService
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides utility methods for using Mortar with Dagger 1.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static ObjectGraph create(MortarScope parent,
                 java.lang.Object... daggerModules)
        Create a new ObjectGraph based on the given module. The new graph will extend the graph found in the parent scope (via ObjectGraph#plus), if there is one.

      • getObjectGraph

        public static ObjectGraph getObjectGraph(android.content.Context context)

      • getObjectGraph

        public static ObjectGraph getObjectGraph(MortarScope scope)

      • inject

        public static void inject(android.content.Context context,
          java.lang.Object object)
        A convenience wrapper for getObjectGraph(android.content.Context) to simplify dynamic injection, typically for Activity and View instances that must be instantiated by Android.

      • inject

        public static void inject(MortarScope scope,
          java.lang.Object object)
        A convenience wrapper for getObjectGraph(android.content.Context) to simplify dynamic injection, typically for Activity and View instances that must be instantiated by Android.
